text: Le Locheur is a former commune. It is found in the Normandy region in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. About 277 people lived there in 2006. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the new commune of Val d'Arry.Arrêté préfectoral 8 September 2016 == References == Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: Le Locheur
